name: Email Tracker + Pixelblock Detector and Blocker
summary: Email tracking extension with aggressive XHR/fetch hooking on Gmail, Outlook, and Yahoo Mail. Strips CSP headers on Outlook domains. Captures Outlook OAuth Bearer tokens and stores them in window-accessible variables. Rewrites all links in outgoing emails through tracking redirects. Injects tracking code into Web Workers via Blob URLs.

vulnerabilities.title: Authorization Token Harvesting
vulnerabilities.description: Captures Outlook OAuth Bearer tokens from fetch requests and stores them in window-accessible JavaScript variables.

vulnerabilities.title: CSP Bypass on Outlook Domains
vulnerabilities.description: Strips Content Security Policy headers on outlook.live.com, outlook.office.com, mail.live.com, and outlook.office365.com.

vulnerabilities.title: Global XHR/Fetch Monkey-Patching
vulnerabilities.description: Completely replaces window.fetch and patches XMLHttpRequest.prototype on Gmail, Outlook, and Yahoo Mail to intercept all API responses.

flags.description: Monkey-patches XMLHttpRequest.prototype on Gmail and Yahoo Mail to intercept API responses
Completely replaces global fetch function on Outlook to intercept and modify email send operations
Captures Outlook OAuth Bearer tokens and stores in window-accessible variables
Strips CSP headers on Outlook domains via declarativeNetRequest
